name: Work Together
author: Bill Robinson

additional_info.title: Errata - FT
additional_info.body:
Correct Text: 
Pacha: “Put your whole back into it!”
Kuzco: “This is my whole back!”

flavor_text: Pacha: Put your whole back into it! Kuzco: This <is> my whole back!
rules_text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their to another chosen character's this turn.)
